author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Coming Spring 2026: http://www.propagation-station.com

In Propagation Station, your love of houseplants becomes a strategic battle of bids, pests, and passive-aggressive plant flexing. 🌿 This cozy auction and tableau game is perfect for 2–4 players who want a game that feels like nurturing a thriving indoor jungle—while lowkey sabotaging their friends along the way. Each round, you’ll bid on new plants and gear, grow your collection, and use equipment like grow lights to boost your setup. But be warned: winning an auction means paying your rivals, and someone’s always ready to unleash a fungus gnat on your precious philodendron.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Propagation Station Preview - Cozy Game, Cutthroat Vibes 🌱 (Board Games Direct)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
On BackerKit Now: https://www.amoebunnies.com/

Amoebunnies is a quick and quirky 2–6 player game where squishy little bunny-creatures dash around the Rainbow Mists chasing their own unique goals. Each bunny has its own movement style, special ability, and win condition—so every play feels different. Master your favorite fluffy blob or try them all to hop your way to victory!

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Amoebunnies Preview - Amoebas but Make Them Bunnies 🐇 (Board Games Direct)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
On Kickstarter Now: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/keymastergames/hanami-samurai-reimagined-a-reiner-knizia-classic?ref=2a1779

Hanami reimagines Reiner Knizia’s classic Samurai with a fresh springtime vibe. You’ll lay down picnic blankets to claim the best spots under the blossoms, gather activity tokens for food, lanterns, and flower viewing, and outsmart rivals for the perfect parkside experience. With two different maps—Japan for the classic rules and Tokyo for new twists—Hanami is all about strategy, cherry blossoms, and a little picnic rivalry.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Hanami Preview - 🌸 From Samurai to Sakura 🍱 (Board Games Direct)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Coming to Kickstarter This Year: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1985games/obojima-tales-from-yatamon?ref=9tjt7k

Yanari: The Witches Market drops you into the magical hustle of Yatamon, where you’re a witch brewing up potions for picky (and not-so-picky) customers. You’ll snag ingredients, mix up concoctions, and try to chain together clever combos with your actions and bonus cauldron moves. Each witch has their own quirky power, plus secret goals and special cards keep every game feeling fresh. Brew the perfect potion for big rewards or settle for “good enough” to keep the customers happy—it’s all about timing, strategy, and a little witchy flair.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts

title: Yanari: The Witches Market Preview - Potions, Customers, and a Dash of Chaos 🧙‍♀️ (BGD)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Coming September 2025: https://bit.ly/RRTSUSD

Railroad Tiles takes the roll-and-write charm of Railroad Ink and turns it into a fast, thinky tile-laying puzzle. Over eight rounds you’ll draft tiles, lay down routes, and try not to trap yourself in a mess of your own making. Each turn you can add cars, trains, or travelers to bring your tiny community to life, but the options keep shifting so planning ahead is key. Score big by linking matching routes, filling a neat rectangle, and pulling off those sweet three-city combos.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Railroad Tiles Preview - First there was Railroad Ink and Now There's Tiles 🚂🚗 (Board Games Direct)
